body:
We can't win.

Newcomers want the help text. Old hands don't care for it at all.

On Sat, Feb 21, 2015 at 11:48 AM, Josh Bleecher Snyder <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I'm writing some slides right now and the help text is driving me bonkers.
> It is a distraction every time I switch from editor to browser and reload,
> particularly when it covers text and/or the Run button.
>
> Can we do one of these:
>
>    - Disable it when on localhost/127.0.0.1
>    - Use local storage and/or cookies to only display it once per browser
>    - Accept a flag to present to disable it (which would have to be
>    passed on to the javascript somehow)
>
> // cc @adg <https://github.com/adg>
